description: large pouch with flap and tie closure at top; decorated with 2 vertical bands of red, yellow and blue quillwork in geometric designs, with red strip bands flanking and between geometric designs; 3 tassels on front wrapped with quills and terminating with 4 horn fragments; flap and sides beaded and decorated with purple dyed hair tassels and metal cone-shaped beads
medium: animal hide, quills, beads, hair, metal, horn (?)
title: Large Bag
